Functions
update_player_hp

Draw the current value of the player HP (bar, HP, MAXHP).  The subroutine will do nothing if it can't draw (not enought space in background buffer or not enought time before NMI) If it has drawn, the PLAYER_FLAG_DRAW_HP of player_flag will be cleared.

/!\ Change registers /!\

/!\ use tmp+0, tmp+1 and tmp+2 /!\
